Namely, while in Euclidean dissimilarity points inside the sphere can reduce the
dissimilarity, the quantum dissimilarity is proportional to the Euclidean dissimilarity only
for unit vectors, and actually increases for points inside the Bloch sphere. Hence we
conclude that the behaviour of 3DSC-kNN does not carry over to SQ-kNN.
